channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This chart tracks the ‘single greatest predictor’ of stock-market returns — it’s never done this before
item.description: Individual stock ownership is a contrarian indicator. It’s flashing a warning.

item.title: ‘They upset me every time I see them’: How long do I keep my mother’s IRS and medical records? She died 4 years ago.
item.description: “Her low income did not require her to file taxes, and once she moved to the care facility, I got her on Medi-Cal.”

item.title: ‘I feel like this does us a disservice’: My brother wants his $1 million inheritance in advance. Should he pay interest?
item.description: “The total value of our family trust is $4 million.”

item.title: This chart shows why upward pressure on long-term Treasury yields matters to borrowers and stocks
item.description: If the 10-year Treasury yield reaches or exceeds 4.5%, it could be a challenge to the market, says BNY

item.title: Investors are making a big bet on Big Tech’s AI spending. They’re about to learn if it paid off.
item.description: A reality check is coming as the Magnificent Seven report earnings. Here’s what to watch.

item.title: Your income-generating investments could create a tax bill. How to prepare for the season
item.description: The tax-filing season officially kicked off on Monday. Investors should watch their mailboxes for key documents they'll need to complete their returns...

item.title: What investors piling into gold and silver can learn from King Henry VIII
item.description: A Deutsche Bank analyst argues those betting on the “debasement trade” may be operating from a faulty premise.

item.title: This energy ETF is set to break through a key level, charts show. Two ways to play the trend
item.description: The State Street Energy Select Sector SPDR ETF (XLE) is poised to break through a resistance level of $50, the charts suggest.

item.title: Forget the 60/40 portfolio. This investor is 70/30 stocks and cash
item.description: Ken Mahoney, CEO of Mahoney Asset Management, said investors should hold onto a "meaningful amount" of cash this year.

item.title: RBC sees a bunch of red flags on Palantir ahead of earnings, sees stock eventually falling 70%
item.description: RBC said that shares of Palantir are still trading at an "unfavorable" risk-reward ratio, despite shedding 9% over the past three months.

item.title: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) Soars on Promising Inflammation Drug Data
item.description: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) stock surges over 42% on positive Phase 1 data for MRT-8102, showing profound reductions in inflammation marker hsCRP. ...
